nodes.excerpt: Answer a few questions, and we’ll transform your memories into a tiny, personalised book filled with: ✔️Your responses ✔️Fun facts, including from your home country ✔️Whimsical illustrations It is 100% free and you’ll receive your booklet in under 10 minutes!

nodes.author: Zaake De Coninck

localize.description: 回答几个问题，我们将把你的记忆变成一本小小的、个性化的书，里面有 ✔️你的回答 ✔️有趣的事实，包括来自你的家乡 ✔️奇思妙想的插图 100%免费，你将在10分钟内收到你的小册子!
localize.tagline: 将你的2020年免费改造成一本小小的个性书!

nodes.excerpt: Expand your skills as an artist with daily art challenges. Categories include drawing, photography, painting, and typography. The best way to improve is daily practice. Challenge yourself and your friends to create something new every day with Creact!

nodes.excerpt: Open Design is the first developer toolkit to read, change, and display data from design files 📤 Process any Figma, Sketch, PSD, AI, or XD file via API 📥 Get design data in a unified JSON format 🛠 Build automations and tools to improve design workflows
nodes.title: Open Design - Dev toolkit to read, change & display data from design files
nodes.author: Tristan Pollock

localize.description: Open Design是第一个从设计文件中读取、更改和显示数据的开发者工具包 📤 通过API处理任何Figma、Sketch、PSD、AI或XD文件 📥 以统一的JSON格式获取设计数据 🛠 构建自动化和工具以改善设计工作流程。
localize.tagline: 从设计文件中读取、更改和显示数据的开发工具包。

localize.description: Open Design是第一個從設計文件中讀取、更改和顯示數據的開發者工具包 📤 通過API處理任何Figma、Sketch、PSD、AI或XD文件 📥 以統一的JSON格式獲取設計數據 🛠 構建自動化和工具以改善設計工作流程。
localize.tagline: 從設計文件中讀取、更改和顯示數據的開發工具包。

nodes.excerpt: Brainiac is a database of 150 cognitive biases, principles & models that influence customer's decision, let you create better products and help you increase your sales. Every single bias includes a sketch, description, possible applications and more

localize.tagline: 控制我们决策的150种认知偏差的数据库。

localize.description: Brainiac是一個包含150個影響客戶決策的認知偏差、原理和模型的數據庫，讓你創造更好的產品，幫助你提高銷售額。每一個偏向都包括一個草圖、描述、可能的應用等。
localize.tagline: 控制我們決策的150種認知偏差的數據庫。

nodes.excerpt: Figma Comments allows you to view and add new comments right from your phone. All you have to do is connect your Figma account and select the files you need. And as your teammates reply, you will see the new comments on the app, in real-time!

localize.description: Figma Comments允许你在手机上直接查看和添加新的评论。您所要做的就是连接您的 Figma 帐户并选择您需要的文件。当你的队友回复时，你将会在应用程序上看到新的评论，而且是实时的。

nodes.title: eProduct.io - Evidence-based Product Management Software
nodes.author: ADIL BERDAI

localize.description: eProduct是一款基于证据的产品管理软件，它能帮助您根据市场证据建立客户驱动的产品，更快地达到市场契合度并提高收入。
localize.tagline: 基于证据的产品管理软件

localize.description: eProduct是一款基於證據的產品管理軟件，它能幫助您根據市場證據建立客戶驅動的產品，更快地達到市場契合度並提高收入。
localize.tagline: 基於證據的產品管理軟件

nodes.excerpt: ManyPixels is an on-demand & tech-enabled design service that is fast, affordable & easy-to-use. 1,500 startups and SMBs have used ManyPixels for their graphic and web design projects. Submit your design request today. Get it back tomorrow. Easy as that!
nodes.title: ManyPixels 2.0 - Your virtual, on-demand graphic design team!
nodes.author: Quentin Gilon

localize.description: ManyPixels是一个按需和科技化的设计服务，它快速、实惠、易于使用。1,500家初创企业和中小企业已经使用ManyPixels进行平面和网页设计项目。今天提交您的设计要求。明天就能得到回复。就这么简单
localize.tagline: 您的虚拟、按需的平面设计团队!

localize.description: ManyPixels是一個按需和科技化的設計服務，它快速、實惠、易於使用。1,500家初創企業和中小企業已經使用ManyPixels進行平面和網頁設計項目。今天提交您的設計要求。明天就能得到回覆。就這麼簡單
